data.title: Clyde Geronimi
data.meta_description: Clyde Geronimi was an Italian-American animator and animated film director. He worked closely with Walt Disney starting in 1931 and he remained with Disney until 1959. He was one of the main directors for the films Cinderella (1950), Sleeping Beauty (1959), Alice in Wonderland (1951) and he won...
data.text:
Recently, we've done several changes to help out this wiki, from deleting empty pages, improving the navigation, adding a rules page, as well as merging film infoboxes.

You can check out the latest overhauls that we have done on this wiki so far, as well as upcoming updates in our announcement post here.
